Special offer for lowendtalk users:

Get 5% OFF with the **LOWENDTALK** coupon.

**Xen VPS Features**
- Instant Setup (Subject to passing our fraud screening)
- Standard Support Service
- Equal Share of CPU
- SolusVM control panel for reboots, reloads
- Each VM has a dedicated share of memory and disk resources.
- Highly secure isolation of VMs from each other.
- Full SSH root access to your VM.
- Uncontended memory, the amount of memory in the VM plan is exclusively assigned to each VM, no "overselling" of memory is possible.
- 7 Day Money Back Guarantee
- 99.9% Network Uptime Guarantee
- VPS Service Price Match Guarantee
- We do not oversell server resources (hardware , hard drive or memory)!!

**XEN-VPS-50**
**Guaranteed RAM:** 512MB (0.5GB)
**Disk Space:** 50GB
**Bandwidth:** 500GB
**Dedicated IP (IPv4):** 1
**Dedicated IP (IPv6):** 15
**CPU:** 1 vCPU Fair Use
**Control Panel:** SolusVM / SSH Access
**Server Location:** Roubaix, France (EU)
**Free £75 Google Adwords Coupon**
**Cost per month:** from **£4.28** / **$6.92** with **LOWENDTALK** coupon
**Order Now:** https://www.web-project.co.uk/clientarea/order.php?step=1&productGroup=15&product=100

http://www.web-project.co.uk/openvz-vps-p-3-13-74.html

- ISPConfig 3 (optional)

Discounts on advance payment are available.

Free £75 Google Adwords voucher* to all new project or new webhosting clients. Terms and conditions apply.
